OP is probably a mid lane main who's getting ganked by roaming supports who pay him a visit. 

Though my personal preference has actually been swifties. You don't necessarily need Lucidity boots if you have CDR from elsewhere. But over Mobis, I prefer having the additional MS in combat, (with the slow resist) to enable more escapes, as well as chase escapees.
